In terms of flexibility bodHOST’s Windows Hyper-V VPS servers are ideal choice for you. With our VPS servers you will get total control over your VPS account. Hence, you will be able to install custom applications and software, with the independence and convenience of a dedicated server.

In addition, these VPS servers are fully managed by us at no extra cost. So, if you need to install or reinstall anything our techs will do this for you.

You can contact us anytime via Live Chat / Toll Free Ph.: 866-662-0909.

2) Hyper-V technology
3) 64-bit Hypervisor Architecture
4) Free Setup & Free Support
